title: Blaze - Stephen King As Richard Bachman [BBC Audiobook]
description:
Blaze 
        - Stephen King As Richard Bachman [BBC Audiobook] -


Published under the name of Richard Bachman, this chilling novel by Stephen King was written early in his career but only recently published.
Mentally-challenged small-time hood Blaze pursues a big job under the guidance of his dead partner...

Read in six parts by William Hope
This was a Radio 7 commission.
